bio: The normally lazy Jibaynan has had a change of heart. Now everything is SERIOUS! Even his hair roots are serious!

soultimate.name: Paws of Fully
soultimate.description: Hit foe with a barrage of hits for lots of damage.

skill.effect: Will hold HP at 1 twice, even if HP falls to 0.
skill.name: True Grit

name: Sternyan
